title.content: Can you work out what Mike should have to eat?

clue1.content: The new cook at school, Mrs Baker, has mixed up the trays with the childrenâ€™s school dinners on.

clue2.content: "YUCK!" cried Ruby, making a face at the slice of pizza in front of her. "I can''t stand pepperoni!"

clue3.content: "Don't look at me," moaned Jack. "I hate any food with cheese on it." At that, he pushed away his cheeseburger.

clue4.content: "Hey, anybody want these chicken wings?" asked Grace. "I don't like anything with meat in it."

clue5.content: Mike scooped up a spoonful of his yogurt and grumbled, "Everybody knows I'm allergic to this stuff."

clue6.content: "Well, yogurt is the only thing I like on the menu," replied Tanya. And there's no way I'm going to eat THIS!" At that, she poked her salad with a fork.
